description: The iEraser is truly The Ultimate Screen Cleaning Device!  Invented by an iPad and Kindle Fire user, this product glides across your screen and magically lifts the grime off with each pass! Average time to clean a tablet screen is only ten seconds. The iEraser is a highly effective device to safely remove fingerprints and smudges from your glossy glass touchscreens such as Tablets, Laptops, even Flat Screen TVs. Think of it as an old timey chalkboard eraser spruced up for our high tech world! It’s so easy - Simply apply moderate pressure and swipe it back and forth across your screen, that’s all there is to it! No messy liquids or sprays to hide away, this product is meant to stay within reach, on your desk or table, ready to use all the time. It is a perfect size for holding in your hand, lightweight (only 2.5 Ounces) and travels well. Made in the U.S.A. from only the very best materials, it is quite rugged and designed to provide thousands and thousands of cleanings. The iEraser comes in Black, White and Pink and we donate one shiny quarter from each piece sold to Charity: Black - Wounded Veterans, White - Disaster Relief, Pink - Children's Cancer. SMART PHONE USERS: Please note that this product is NOT intended to be used on phones due to facial oil and makeup, But, check back in coming months as we are developing a superior solution to this problem. SCREEN PROTECTION FILM USERS: Please note that this product is NOT intended to clean plastic films applied to screens.
title: Best iProducts LLC. iEraser Tablet Screen Cleaner Black (IEraser Black)
